reviewText: Great film, Jason miller, Fred.carpenter...tom Sciacca as the gas station guy in a part that was to be a cameo for Anthony Quinn, who.was.a friend of the.director..

A hidden gem.  A smart thriller in true film noir form.  This is an unusual film I stumbled across on cable late one night.  It has plot twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat.  I wish I could get it on DVD or Download on NetFLIX.  It seems to only be on VHS??

This is an entertaining film to say the least. Jason Miller is
great in his role as a detective trying to hide from his past.
The story unfolds with a complicated murder plot and builds from
there. The ending is very pleasing.
